Articles.Content:
I have found mention of this bug before, but nobody seems to have mentioned it since v.23.5. It's ruining my game.

KSP:

0.90 (Unix) - Unity: 4.5.5f1 - OS: Linux 3.13 LinuxMint 17 64bit

Problem:

Clamp-o-tron Sr will not release upon contextual menu command.

Mods Installed:

USI Tools - 0.3.1

SCANsat Mission Pack - 1.0.1

Chatterer - 0.8.0.86

Community Resource Pack - 0.3.2

Contract Configurator - 0.5

Contracts Window Plus - 1.0.3

RasterPropMonitor - 0.18.3

KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5

Kerbal Engineer Redux 1.0 - 1.0.14.1

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement - 3.0.1

MemoryUsage - 1.1.1

RCS Build Aid - 0.5.4

Regolith - 0.1.2

SCANsat - 1.0.9.3

TextureReplacer - 2.1.2

Trajectories - 1.1.2

Kerbal Alarm Clock - 3.2.1

Transfer Window Planner - 1.2.2

USI Exploration Pack - 0.3.1

Freight Transport Tech - 0.3

Karbonite - 0.5.1

Karbonite Plus - 0.3

VenStockRevamp - 1.6

StockBugFix - 0.1.7d

I've used CKAN to install nearly everything, so it should be up to date.

Reproduction Steps:

Build a launcher with a orbital refueller attached to the top via two clamp-o-tron Sr docks, oriented correctly, launch into orbit, try to decouple the docks and the parts stay stuck together. this has happened twice on two different saves, different builds of craft.

Log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/le4elhmmw8rp53y/Player.log?dl=0

Edit: and again.

Edited January 10, 2015 by KerBlam
BUGZZZ

I have this on a ton of my Clamp o tron juniors.. extremely annoying.

My mod list is as follows:

KSP: 0.90 (Win32) - Unity: 4.5.5f1 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

USI Tools - 0.3.1

Community Resource Pack - 0.3.2

DMagic Orbital Science - 0.9.1

Kerbal Engineer Redux 1.0 - 1.0.14.1

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement - 3.1.1

KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5

NavHud - 1.1.4

Docking Port Alignment Indicator - 5.1

PlanetShine - 0.2.2.1

RCS Build Aid - 0.5.4

RealChute - 1.2.6.3

Regolith - 0.1.2

SCANsat - 1.0.9.41

TAC Fuel Balancer - 2.4.1.1008

TextureReplacer - 2.1.2

Trajectories - 1.1.2

Kerbal Alarm Clock - 3.2.2

Alternate Resource Panel - 2.6.3

Transfer Window Planner - 1.2.3

Karbonite - 0.5.1

Karbonite Plus - 0.3

MKS - 0.22.3

Also, a Science Career mode save can be found here:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/z17cvpi507cpcb6/DockingIssues.sfs?dl=0

Try go to anything on the Mun and Undock.. it will, but will then still be stuck together... so you are pretty screwed. I have also been using CKAN for ones available on there. Could it be one of the Addons we have in common?
If you guys read the KJR thread, it seems to be a bug with Kerbal Joint Reinforcement. Ferram says there's a dev build that should fix it. I don't have a link for it, however.

If you guys read the KJR thread, it seems to be a bug with Kerbal Joint Reinforcement. Ferram says there's a dev build that should fix it. I don't have a link for it, however.

Great! thanks, I didn't know that. I did a quite a few google searches and only came up with 0.23 issues, which was not repeated in my files. You are a lifesaver

EDIT: Can confirm that removing KJR fixed all my "undocking" issues.

Edited January 18, 2015 by talung
Added Update
Thanks guys, I'm going to wait until the patch is applied to KJR release.

Oh, is this what's been causing all my problems recently? I've been tearing my hair out over nothing undocking until a save/reload, and then there being a 50% chance of it nuking whatever I dock with next.
The dev build of KJR fixes the problem, it's linked in the KJR thread.
problem solved but with a restriction: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-0-90-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-1-1-15-15?p=1695367&viewfull=1#post1695367
